text: 'Best cuban restaurant'

text: 'We had food delivered and it was amazing!'

author: Hilario Galan
text: 'Everything is always good.'

author: Ike Spangler
text: 'Chango failed to update their hours on Chownow. Wasted a hungry hour of my Friday night waiting for an order that never came. Unfortunately
column5: the order was confirmed via email. Frustrating experience.'

author: Jonathan Petrakakos
text: 'I always have a great experience at Chango. The staff is friendly and the food (especially the sandwiches) is amazing. BYOB too. I highly recommend the cubano or the Venezuelan steak sandwich.'

author: Fred Marten
text: 'Really authentic Cuban food! Reminded me of my childhood in Miami.'

author: Emilie Knight
text: 'I would give Chango Kitchen 10 stars if I could.  Everything Iâ€™ve tried is amazing.'

author: Andrew G
text: 'The breakfast tamales were awesome. No argument there. I could have used more creme fraiche though. The morir sondano was excellent as usual. We haven\'t been inside since their renovation and it\'s quite nice. All staff were very conscientious about mask wearing but customers often completely ignored the huge "no mask no entry" sign. The infection numbers are up again and we should be more careful.'

author: Terrence Richardson
text: 'Really good tasty Cuban food.'

author: Vasisht Batchu
text: 'I have been coming here for over a decade(the old restaurant too) and the food is amazingly good every single time.'

author: gia hargrove
text: 'This is the second time I order the steak sandwich even the flavors were good I could count one one hand the strips of steak on the sandwich all I tasted was mayo and onions
column5: the server was extremely rude. Handed her my money she placed it on the counter I hate that. If I give it to you you should give me my change back'

author: Michelle Dziuban
text: 'Mango salmon with rice and beans was INCREDIBLE. Plantains are a must. So much flavor all around!'

author: Erick Crespo
text: 'Love this place. Excellent food and everyone is so nice. Always a great experience. Highly recommend!'

column5: very good food as well! Prices though can be a bit better!'

text: 'Amazing value and quality of food. The short ribs and pineapple smoothie were delicious.'

text: 'Super authentic
column5: reasonably priced and delicious. Some of the best food in Hoboken in my opinion. Plus itâ€™s byob. 10/10 would recommend.'

text: 'Great new spot with a lot of tempting options at surprisingly affordable prices'

text: 'Very nice place

Don't trust Chango for ordering with Grubhub or Seamless. If something goes wrong with your delivery

text: "Would say 3.5 but I'll give you guys the extra for having relatively good prices ðŸ˜‰ No idea what the nutrition was but I felt healthy after"

author: Marcela G.
text: 'A big shout out to my best latin place in Hoboken: Chango Kitchen. Traditional yummy latin dishes. Our fabs are churrasco con chimichurri (skirt steakgrilled) and ropa vieja (shredded beef). My kids loved "alfajores with dulce de leche"
column5: "tres leches" and hot chocolate with when is cold outside. Services is warm and friendly.\nI can visit the place multiples times and never get tired. You should try it as well!'

author: Nicholas Gentile
text: 'Mofongo!'

text: 'Chango kitchen has such delicious food and the most attentive staff!'

author: Shuna Harley
text: 'OMG. The service
column5: food and atmosphere were all aligned to perfection. This is the place to be 2021 Covid season. Their service enforces the rules and regulations implemented by the CDC.'

author: Michelle M
text: 'Iâ€™m not one to post reviews too much but I just had to say this place is absolutely amazing. My son was born in beginning of Covid And it wasnâ€™t easy to just cook all the time but we tried chango on UBER and we have been ordering ever since. The customer service is incredible we canâ€™t wait to come visit in person
column5: my sons a little picky and this is the only place he will eat rice beans and empanadas other than mine!!  Keep up the great work !!'
